name: Yita and the sacred stones
description:
hello everyone, i'm a italian developer and i love anime , i want to introduce you to my two-year development project, the game is an action visual novel with simple platform elements and tells the story of two sisters affected by a curse in search of the truth,  they cannot meet and they are each other's weapon

The game is in alpha, sorry for any bugs and non-optimal animations, I recommend playing with the joypad.

on first start the game starts with full screen and high detail, if it starts with the keyboard go to the options and select the desired resolution and the joypad if you want to use, the settings will be saved.

the settings will be saved and game session  will have the last selected settings

Sorry for my bad English in dialogue game :-( 

this is a map for controller (test on controller pad xbox360)

I try to update the game periodically

CHARACTERS:

YITA:

1.55 cm tall, she has an impetuous and impulsive character, she is Zure's older sister

ZURE:

1.63cm tall is Yita's younger twin sister.

She has a sweet and optimistic character, she tries to make her sister more feminine in ways to find a husband

VICENTIA:

height unknown, Vicentia is a mysterious creature who lives in the forbidden lands, will she be an enemy or a friend?

there are two other characters in the game, but for now I won't show them so as not to create spoilers

i hope like it.

peace

Fabrizio
